name: 3D Taxi Racing NYC - Real Crazy City Car Driving Simulator Game FREE Version
name_original: 3D Taxi Racing NYC - Real Crazy City Car Driving Simulator Game FREE Version
description:
Take to the Streets of New York in this thrilling Taxi Racing Game. How far can you get before causing a high speed accident? Blast through the city in your taxi! This is no game for the weak of heart. How far can you get?

Features:
-Realistic 3D Environments
-Accurate NYC Taxi
-Dynamic Traffic system
